log._comment: Configuration of the Log File (Possible values: DEBUG, INFO, WARN, ERROR, FATAL).

chi_squared_test._comment0: Select number of estimated states involved in the position estimation. For example, if position(3), clock(1), troposphere(1) and ionosphere(1) are the active states, it is 6
chi_squared_test._comment1: Select number of estimated states involved in the velocity estimation. For example, if velocity(3) and clock drift(1) are the active states, it is 4

error_configs._comment1: select static or dynamic reference trajectory (coordinates with respect to ECEF frame [meters])
